name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conduit Copilot - AI analyst for business

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conduit is a Copilot AI for business owners. You can think of it like a data analyst in a box, powered by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Conduit brings together SaaS data such as in Shopify, Square and Facebook Ads, into a single dashboard, all with point and click. Business owners can then ask questions like “what’s my most profitable product category” or “which ad campaigns should I turn off.”

By integrating GPT-powered AI tools, you can seamlessly connect, analyze, and visualize your data, unlocking a new level of efficiency and productivity.

With plain English instructions, you can seamlessly integrate live business data from your systems of record, such as Salesforce, Shopify, Tableau, and Snowflake, directly into your Sheets.

Combine the power of AI with live business data to effortlessly build the reports and dashboards you desire, all in record time and with unmatched flexibility.

Utilize robust formulas for data cleaning, formatting, querying, enriching, and analysis, making data manipulation a breeze.

Auto-Generate Formulas, Pivots, & Charts with Simple Text Commands

Experience the convenience of automatically generating powerful formulas, pivot tables, and visualizations with any dataset using plain English instructions. GPT Copilot will jump in to assist you; just type what you need, and it's done!

Get Unparalleled Data Insights Faster Than Ever

Rely on Conduit's GPT Copilot to handle the heavy lifting, freeing up your time to delve into data analysis. You'll be amazed as GPT Copilot intelligently analyzes any table and generates stunning, insightful charts highlighting the trends you value most. Embrace a more productive and efficient approach to data analysis with Conduit AI.
